name: Fighting Man
description:
This game like no other. Fight against the 20 most vicious fighters and come out as winner and take the mantle of THE BEST Fighter.
But road to the top is not that easy

Features:
- Fighters Combo Learn Joystick or Beat the Challenge Friends
- Arcade Mode – Play against 19 Real fighters
- Single Player Mode – Play against AI
- Watch and Learn – AI vs AI
- Practice Match – Harness your fighter skills
- Smooth Game Play
- High Definition Graphics
- Highly Responsive
- 20 Fighters to choose from with different fighting skills and class
